All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AdamSmith
Represents the Adam Smith champion.
AugustoPinochet
Represents the Augusto Pinochet champion.
AugustusCaesar
Represents the Augustus Caesar champion.
Axe
Represents an Axe weapon.
BaseballBat
Represents a Baseball Bat weapon.
BernardMontgomery
Represents the Bernard Montgomery champion.
Chainsaw
Represents a Chainsaw weapon.
Champion
Champion Class, responsible for data and functionality related to each individual champion competing.
ChampionCard
A concrete implementation of the purchasable card for displaying a champion as a card.
ChampionJoins
Represents a random event in which a random champion joins the team
ChampionMatchCard
A card to represent a champion that is currently on the grid in a live match.
ChampionQuits
Represents a random event in which a random champion quits the team
ChampionSetupView
View which allows the user to choose four champions to take part in the match
CharlesDarwin
Represents the Charles Darwin champion.
CommandLineDisplay
A concrete implementation of the DisplayStrategy interface for the CLI.
CommandLineGameManager
A subclass of GameManager that represents the CLI version of the game.
CommandLineTable
Static class which offers various functionality for printing different tables featuring the stats of champions and weapons
CommandLineUtilities
An abstract class that contains useful static methods for printing to the terminal.
Configuration
This class holds many base configuration values used in calculations across the game This class also holds information regarding difficulty.
Confucius
Represents the Confucius champion.
Cutscene
The cutscene objects contains a list of cutscene slides for iterating through to simulate a story line for the game.
CutsceneSlide
Cutscene Class Made to be played in a certain order, showing an image and text to the player.
CutsceneView
A panel to display a cutscene.
Dagger
Represents a Dagger weapon.
DavidLange
Represents the David Lange champion.
DisplayStrategy
The strategy design pattern for creating a contract between the GUI and CLI display to display the same views for the game.
DisplayType
An enum representing the display type for the game.
DonationEvent
Represents a random event in which a team receives a donation of money
DouglasMacArthur
Represents the Douglas MacArthur champion.
DumbMatch
Class which represents a 'dumb' match, which is a match with no visuals occuring.
DwightEisenhower
Represents the Dwight Eisenhower champion.
ElvisPresley
Represents the Elvis Presley champion.
EndingView
The ending view, which shows the screen which shows the ranks of the four teams in the tournament and allows the player to start a new game or quit
Fists
Fists are the default weapon for all champions
FranzFerdinand
Represents the Franz Ferdinand champion.
FreeWeaponEvent
Represents a random event in which the team receives a free weapon
FryingPan
Represents a Frying Pan weapon.
FullTeamException
Full team exception.
GameEnvironment
Class which represents the general environment of the game, This class keeps track of the current week, maximum week, and random events that may occur
GameFinishedException
Game finished exception Exception when the game is finished
GameManager
The GameManager class is an abstract class that defines the basic functionality of a game manager.
GeorgeWashington
Represents the George Washington champion.
GhengisKhan
Represents the Ghengis Khan champion.
GolfClub
Represents a Golf Club weapon.
GraphicalDisplay
A concrete implementation of the DisplayStrategy interface for the GUI.
GraphicalGameManager
A subclass of GameManager that represents the GUI version of the game.
HarryTruman
Represents the Harry Truman champion.
HeaderPanel
A panel containing a white label in header font and an optional gray background for readability.
IllegalPurchaseException
Illegal Purchase Exception Exception for when a purchase cannot be done because an AI team has already purchased a weapon
IncompleteTeamException
Incomplete team exception Exception for when a team has less than four champions
InfoPanel
Panel for the info panel which runs along the top of the screen and displays the team name, money, score, week and difficulty
InputException
Input Exception Exception for when a users input is not expected or allowed
InsufficientFundsException
Insufficient funds exception Called when a team attempts to purchase something but does not have enough money
JoeRogan
Represents the Joe Rogan champion.
JohnBrowning
Represents the John Browning champion.
JohnDoe
Represents the John Doe champion.
JohnFKennedy
Represents the John F Kennedy champion.
JohnMaynardKeynes
Represents the John Maynard Keynes champion.
JosefStalin
Represents the Josef Stalin champion.
Katana
Represents a Katana weapon.
KingGeorge
Represents the King George V champion.
LevelUpStat
Represents the champion stat that the player has selected to level up for a champion.
LevelUpView
Static class which handles showing the level up dialogue for a champion and communicating the chosen stat to level up to the game manager
LiveMatch
Live match, represents a match shown on the UI to the player
Mace
Represents a Mace weapon.
Machete
Represents a Machete weapon.
MarcusAurelius
Represents the Marcus Aurelius champion.
MargaretThatcher
Represents the Margaret Thatcher champion.
MarieCurie
Represents the Marie Curie champion.
Match
Superclass for dumb and live matches, Keeps hold of relevant data relating to a match as well as some helper functions for combat
MatchResult
A data class that holds the results of a match that has just ended.
MatchView
A panel to display the currently playing live match.
MatthiasGalster
Represents the Matthias Galster champion.
MikolosHorthy
Represents the Mikolos Horthy champion.
NapoleonBonaparte
Represents the Napoleon Bonaparte champion.
NeilArmstrong
Represents the Neil Armstrong champion.
NikitaKrustchev
Represents the Nikita Krustchev champion.
Nunchucks
Represents a Nunchucks weapon.
OpeningCutscene
The cutscene for the game that is played when you first run the game.
PhilGarland
Represents the Phil Garland champion.
PhilippePetain
Represents the Philippe Petain champion.
Pickaxe
Represents a Pickaxe weapon.
Pitchfork
Represents a Pitchfork weapon.
Purchasable
Interface for objects that can be purchased in the shop.
PurchasableCard
An abstract class for displaying a purchasable in the form of a panel.
QueenVictoria
Represents the Queen Victoria champion.
RadiationPoisoningEvent
Represents a random event in which a member of the team receives radiation poisoning
RampagingAnimalEvent
Represents a random event in which a member of the team is exhausted by a rampaging animal
RandomEvent
Random event superclass, This class represents a randomly occurring event which could happen during a week's end.
RandomEventInfo
Random Event GUI Info This class is intended to act as a 'parcel' of information to be instantiated at each random event and passed through to the GUI It is done like this so that random events can be easily stored in a list and presented to the user once at a time by the GUI.
RobertMuldoon
Represents the Robert Muldoon champion.
RudyardKipling
Represents the Rudyard Kipling champion.
Scythe
Represents a Scythe weapon.
SetupManager
An abstract class that contains static methods for handling user input inside the setup stage of the game.
SetupView
View which shows the setup view to the player
Shield
Represents a Shield weapon.
ShokoAsahara
Represents the Shoko Asahara champion.
Shop
The Shop class represents a store where players can purchase items for use in the game.
ShopView
A panel that display the shop.
Shovel
Represents a Shovel weapon.
Shuriken
Represents a Shuriken weapon.
SimonHoermann
Represents the Simon Hoermann champion.
Sledgehammer
Represents a Sledgehammer weapon.
Spear
Represents a Spear weapon.
StadiumView
A panel to display the stadium.
StatLabel
A stat label is a panel that shows a certain stat in a pre-formatted way.
StephenHawking
Represents the Stephen Hawking champion.
SunTzu
Represents the Sun Tzu champion.
Sword
Represents a Sword weapon.
TabbedView
A panel that contains a tabbed pane for navigating between the game's team, shop, and stadium views.
Team
Represents a team in the game.
TeamView
View which displays information regarding the team, Referred to in project specifications as the 'club'
TedKaczynski
Represents the Ted Kaczynski champion.
TennisRacket
Represents a Tennis Racket weapon.
ThiefEvent
Represents a random event in which the team is stolen from
TimBell
Represents the Tim Bell champion.
TVShowEvent
Represents a random event in which the team receives donations from appearing on an alien tv show
Weapon
Class Weapon contains all the general properties and functionality a weapon should have.
WeaponCard
Card which displays weapon statistics
WeaponSetupView
Class which handles the weapon setup view, which is where the player selects which of their weapons are given to each champion.
WilliamShakespeare
Represents the William Shakespeare champion.
